attributes.action: Unite the commonwealth back into the British Empire
attributes.additional_details: If we reunite the commonwealth into the British Empire we will have a much larger global influence and will be able to protect smaller countries.
attributes.background: The British Empire was the most formidable Empire in history and it’s achievements are unparalleled. Look at the counties we created, Australia, New Zealand, America, the list goes on. Our poor ex-colonies in Africa want us back.
